welcome-header: Manage your sales and increase your income even more!
welcome-title: Lime Store helps you increase your sales even more
about-one-text-header: Open your business to new opportunities and increase your income
about-two-text-header: Simplify your work and increase productivity
about-two-text-one: Lime Store is very easy to use. Unlike other sales systems, there is no slowdown during use
about-two-text-two: It has a simple interface. The program is very easy to use and requires no training
about-two-text-three: We provide transparent and accessible reporting. Calculate your income and expenses with one touch through daily monthly and weekly reports
about-try-text-header: Start trying the LimeStore app now
about-try-text-one: Use the application demo without wasting time and test the functions of the LimeStore application for yourself
about-try-text-two: Just visit the link below to check out the latest features
tarrif-text-demo: Try a 14-day free trial and get unlimited use of all features
tarrif-text-monthly: Unlimited use of functions with a monthly subscription
tarrif-text-halfYear: Use the 6-month tariff and get a 1-month discount
tarrif-text-yearly: Get an annual plan Pay less for 2 months and get premium features for free
contact-text-header-paragraph: Would you like to learn more about LimeStore, get a quote or talk to an expert? Tell us what you're looking for and we'll get back to you right away
footer-text-devInfo: is a creator of this site
